Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • Control
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeyboardControl, PS3Control

    public abstract class Control
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is suppose to be a basic control class that with all basic controls the purpose is to be able to join together different controls (not using Vector) into an array basically manage all controls by letting them be the same type
    Author:
    josuerojas
